page.title: 06Industry
page.content: There are several small industries in Llanrwst. The old engine repair sheds at Llanrwst Railway Station have been converted into a Metal Welding and Repair Shop. In the nearby small industrial complex is a firm making smoke and heat detecting equipment,and another specialising in lighting for T.V. and Film making, freelance. In Willow Street is a carpenter's business specialising in stripping furniture,and a printing business.Galatrek are precision electronic engineers who have recently been awarded a contract for work for the Chinese Government. The Forestry Commission produce timber and Christmas Trees, and also provide information services for visitors, such as mounting exhibitions and maintaining and sign posting of nature walks.
